snippet: As a debate ensues on the severity of a possible strike on Syria, a State Department official said an attack would most likely not alter the military balance in the country.
lead_paragraph: As a debate ensues on the severity of a possible strike on Syria, a State Department official said an attack would most likely not alter the military balance in the country.

headline.main: U.S. Official Predicts ‘War of Attrition’ Among Syrian Fighters After Strike
headline.print_headline: U.S. Official Predicts ‘War of Attrition’ Among Syrian Fighters After Strike
